mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAYMENT (PAYMENTNO, USERNO, PRONO, STATUSNO, UIDNO, PAYMENTDATE, TOTALPRICE, NAME, PRONAME) VALUES (#{paymentNo}, #{userNo}, #{proNo}, 1, #{uidNo}, SYSDATE, #{totalPrice}, #{name}, #{proName})
mapper.select:
SELECT PAYMENTNO,USERID,NAME,PRONAME,TOTALPRICE,PAYMENTDATE,STATUSNAME,PRONO FROM(SELECT ROWNUM R, B.* FROM( SELECT PM.*, M.USERID, PS.STATUSNAME FROM PAYMENT PM JOIN MEMBER M ON (PM.USERNO = M.USERNO) JOIN PAYMENTSTATUS PS ON (PM.STATUSNO = PS.STATUSNO)
ORDER BY PAYMENTDATE DESC )B ) WHERE R BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{lastRow}
SELECT COUNT(PAYMENTNO) FROM PAYMENT PM JOIN MEMBER M ON (PM.USERNO = M.USERNO) JOIN PAYMENTSTATUS PS ON (PM.STATUSNO = PS.STATUSNO)
mapper.update: UPDATE PAYMENT SET STATUSNO = 0 , REASON=#{reason} WHERE UIDNO = #{uidNo}
